name: io.bytes.per.checksum
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "io.bytes.per.checksum" is set to 0, which is causing an Invalid checksum type error. This option should be set to a positive integer to specify the number of bytes per checksum.

name: dfs.client.socket.send.buffer.size
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "dfs.client.socket.send.buffer.size" is set to 0, which may affect TCP connection throughput. This option should be set to a positive integer to specify the buffer size for a write pipeline in DFSClient side.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
relevant log: 1-ERROR	Thread Thread[eventHandlingThread,5,main] threw an Exception.org.apache.hadoop.HadoopIllegalArgumentException: Invalid checksum type: userOpt=null, default=CRC32C:0, effective=null
explanation: The configuration option "dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size" is set to 0, which disables the 'hedged' reads feature in DFSClient. This option should be set to a positive integer to enable this feature.
